comments:
I had set my Ant runtime to 1.5.2 and tried to debug a script in a seperate 
VM. The following appeared in the Ant console:

java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: org.apache.tools.ant.Target.getLocation()
Lorg/apache/tools/ant/Location;
at org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.antsupport.logger.util.AntDebugUtil.marshalStack
(AntDebugUtil.java:105)
at 
org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.antsupport.logger.debug.RemoteAntDebugBuildLogger.m
arshallStack(RemoteAntDebugBuildLogger.java:313)
at 
org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.antsupport.logger.debug.RemoteAntDebugBuildLogger$R
eaderThread.run(RemoteAntDebugBuildLogger.java:122)

Fixed in AntDebugUtil to return the UnknownLocation if Target does not support 
getLocation. Dependency stack frames will not provide source lookup.

Also fixed AntProcessDebugBuildLogger and RemoteAntDebugBuildLogger to not 
show an incorrect dependency stack when there are no dependencies (was always 
showing the first target as a dependency)
